title: Looking to Trade My Two Ansons for Your One
author: scotgreb

posts.post_title: Looking to Trade My Two Ansons for Your One
posts.post_content:
Long shot, I know but looking to upgrade my N162 Anson -- preferably to a clean, well-centered PSA 2/3. The two I have to offer are below -- happy to adjust with cash either way. Please PM with interest -- and neither is currently for sale. Scott

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=490398&d=1638320744[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=490399&d=1638320750[/IMG]

Agreed those look great
